QueryViewSpec.Name: Multiview Columns Format Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: GL Post Custom Output Format Query for Multiview
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select -- *** these columns are for the Multiview formatting ***: case when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,1,4) = 'CRED' then case when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,3) = 'CCF' then 'CCF' when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,5) = 'SF000' then 'SF' when isnumeric (substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,7,4)) = 1 then substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,1) + '-' + substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,7,4) when isnumeric (substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,8,3)) = 1 then case -- Change IN-0xx to IN-4xx or IN-5xx for 416, 428, 430, 432, 527, 531, 534, 535, 536, 537, 538, 539, 540, 541, 542, 543, 544, 545, 546, 547, 548, 549 when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,5) in ('IN016', 'IN028', 'IN030', 'IN032') then 'IN-4' + substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,9,2) when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,5) in ('IN027', 'IN031', 'IN034', 'IN035', 'IN036', 'IN037', 'IN038', 'IN039', 'IN040', 'IN041', 'IN042', 'IN043', 'IN044', 'IN045', 'IN046', 'IN047', 'IN048', 'IN049') then 'IN-5' + substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,9,2) else substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,2) + '-' + substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,8,3) end else 'ERROR' end when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,1,4) = 'BANK' then 'BANK' else 'ERROR' -- Not CRED or BANK end as ACCOUNT, /* -- doesn't appear that the multiview output file contains this column!?!? case when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,1,4) = 'BANK' then case when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,3) = 'CCF' then 'CCF' when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,5) = 'SF000' then 'SF' when isnumeric (substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,7,4)) = 1 then substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,1) + '-' + substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,7,4) when isnumeric (substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,8,3)) = 1 then case -- Change IN-0xx to IN-4xx or IN-5xx for 416, 428, 430, 432, 527, 531, 534, 535, 536, 537, 538, 539, 540, 541, 542, 543, 544, 545, 546, 547, 548, 549 when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,5) in ('IN016', 'IN028', 'IN-030', 'IN032') then 'IN-4' + substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,9,2) when substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,5) in ('IN027', 'IN031', 'IN-034', 'IN035', 'IN036', 'IN037', 'IN038', 'IN039', 'IN040', 'IN041', 'IN042', 'IN043', 'IN044', 'IN045', 'IN046', 'IN047', 'IN048', 'IN049') then 'IN-5' + substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,9,2) else substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,6,2) + '-' + substring (GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT,8,3) end else 'ERROR' end else '' end as BANKACCOUNT, */ --GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT, --dateadd(YY,1,GLTRANSACTION.POSTDATE), --GLTRANSACTION.POSTDATE, --GLTRANSACTION.TRANTYPE, --GLTRANSACTION.DEBITCREDIT, --GLTRANSACTION.AMOUNT, GLTRANSACTION.POSTDATE as POSTDATE, 'R' as TRANTYPE, case GLTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONTYPECODE when 0 then 'D' else 'C' end as DEBITCREDIT, GLTRANSACTION.AMOUNT, '' as BLANKCOLUMN, case when (case when REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION.OUTDATED = 0 then REVENUE.BATCHNUMBER else reverseRevenue.BATCHNUMBER end) = '' then 'NB2016-' + right ('0' + cast(month (GLTRANSACTION.POSTDATE) as nvarchar(2)), 2) + right ('0' + cast(day (GLTRANSACTION.POSTDATE) as nvarchar(2)), 2) --else GLTRANSACTION.BATCHNUMBER else (case when REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION.OUTDATED = 0 then REVENUE.BATCHNUMBER else reverseRevenue.BATCHNUMBER end) end as MV_BATCHNUMBER,
-- *** END OF MULTIVIEW COLUMNS **** GLTRANSACTION.ID as GLTRANSACTIONID, GLTRANSACTION.ACCOUNT as ACCOUNTSTRING, GLTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT, GLTRANSACTION.ORGANIZATIONAMOUNT, case when REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION.OUTDATED = 0 then REVENUE.BATCHNUMBER else reverseRevenue.BATCHNUMBER end as BATCHNUMBER
from dbo.GLTRANSACTION left join REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION on GLTRANSACTION.ID = REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION.GLTRANSACTIONID left join dbo.REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION reversed on reversed.GLTRANSACTIONID = GLTRANSACTION.REVERSEDGLTRANSACTIONID and reversed.OUTDATED = 1 left join REVENUE reverseRevenue on reverseRevenue.ID = reversed.REVENUEID left join REVENUE on REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION.REVENUEID = REVENUE.ID
